text: This is the costume for the live with everyone, right?

I've always thought that just matching
with Mano and Meguru isn't enough.

I thought I should improve myself. If I become better,
maybe I'll have the flexibility to match with someone else.

I see.
So, you felt like there wasn't enough time.

Yeah, I'm glad you feel that way, Hiori.
We're all here as part of 283PRO.

However...
this might disqualify me as a producer for saying this.

I believe that if each person shines in their own way,
there's no need to match perfectly.
